channel.title: Small Command Help

item.title: Small Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

[quote=“PKOwner, post:2, topic:41353”]There should be a ::master in your source
If not use this
Note Anti Leached
Read it before u paste

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) //Rights << { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); Remove this line or add a // addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("Text Here.")[/quote]
why would you antileech a command…

Read full topic

item.title: Small Command Help
item.dc:creator: @PKOwner PKOwner
item.description:
@PKOwner wrote:

There should be a ::master in your source
If not use this
Note Anti Leached
Read it before u paste

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) //Rights << { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); Remove this line or add a // addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("Text Here.")
